primevc.gui.components.ITextArea

type
interface
implements
primevc.gui.traits.ITextStylable
primevc.gui.core.IUIElement

Instance Variables

columnGap(default,setColumnGap) : Int

Number of pixels between columns

columnWidth(getColumnWidth,setColumnWidth) : Int

The width of one column. If not specified, the width will be calculated automaticly.

maxColumns(default,setMaxColumns) : Int

Maximum number of columns that the textarea can have.
